roleset.name: unable to control flow of bodily waste
roleset.note: INCONTINENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from incontinent.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: A resident who-1 *-1 is incontinent of urine has an increased risk of developing. (A) dementia. (B) urinary tract infections.
